Welcome to hicstuff's documentation!
====================================
hicstuff is a python library to generate and manipulate Hi-C matrices. It aims to be easy to use and install.
You can follow hicstuff's development on `Github <https://github.com/koszullab/hicstuff>`_ .

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
